person.persName: Andrew Jackson Martin (Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Mary Martin. Father of Ambrose C. Martin, Martha E. Martin, Mary E. Martin, Elizabeth H. Martin, Emmy N. Martin, and Grace T. Martin. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Lyon County in 1860.
